title: Hampshire Hideaway 30 Minutes from Downton Abbey Castle
description: Enjoy a countryside escape at Holiday Inn Basingstoke, an IHG Hotel, only a half-hour's drive from the austerity of Highclere Castle where Downtown Abbey was filmed. Located in Hampshire, the hotel is southwest of London, and the perfect place to escape the metropolitan hustle and take a walking tour of the town with fresh country air and stunning vistas. Complete your evening with a pint and a bite at Traders restaurant onsite, or tuck in with their all-day room service.
location_description: Holiday Inn Basingstoke, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Grove Road, Basingstoke RG21 3EE, United Kingdom

title: Basingstoke City Stay Minutes from Railway Station
description: Surrounded by tranquil wooded greenery and only minutes from transportation and urban streets, Crowne Plaza Basingstoke, an IHG Hotel, is a verdant refuge with easy access to the city. Wake your body up at the fully-equipped fitness centre or melt away tense muscles in the sauna and steam room. Enjoy modern and creative dishes and a refined cocktail at 1449 Restaurant, Bar and Grill or consider heading into the city centre to experience vibrant restaurants, bars and retail.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Basingstoke, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Old Common Road Black Dam, Basingstoke RG21 3PR, United Kingdom
